DOC.brief_summary: Objective examine physical activity screen-time behavior child enrol license childcare center enactment new state regulation .
DOC.brief_title: Physical Activity Screen-Time Regulations Childcare Centers - Aim 2
DOC.detailed_description: Pause Play aim enroll 266 child . Each child participate study approximately 1 year . Surveys , anthropometric measure , screen-time observation take approximately 1 day complete , child give accelerometer wear home 7 day baseline 1 year follow-up . Staff member spend approximately 2 week childcare center baseline 1 year follow-up complete study procedure child .
DOC.criteria: A child 3 4 year old Child spend least 6 hour per day , 5 day per week participate childcare center Child continue attend childcare center next year Parent/legal guardian unwilling provide write informed consent
